lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer shot a two-over 73, going wire to wire to win the Jamie Farr Owens Corning Classic in Sylvania, Ohio, by two strokes. Creamer had higher scores every day after breaking the tournament record with an 11-under 60 in the first round. She followed with a 65 and a 70, and finished at 16-under 268, two shots better than Nicole Castrale.
